message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $22,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects its worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and features.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $19,000. This is my final offer for this round.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $19,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. This is my best offer so far.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $14,000 is close, but I need to get at least $16,500 for this product.  This will be my final offer.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to save some money. I'm willing to offer $14,500. This is my last offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
